name: wag
description:
Empirically derived exchangability matrix for general proteins.

This command only refers to the symmetric part of the WAG model, not the frequencies.  Frequencies are added by using the `+f` command.  Frequencies are estimated by default but can be fixed to the values estimated in the paper using `+f[wag_freq]`.

citation.title: A General Empirical Model of Protein Evolution Derived from Multiple Protein Families Using a Maximum-Likelihood Approach
